targets.query: environment:${zone} AND (role:"alice-staff-backend") AND (message:"404 Not Found" AND message:"prod-web-internal.aliceapp.com")
environment:${zone} AND (role:web OR role:jobs) AND message:"Result Window"
environment:${zone} AND (role:"web" OR role:"jobs") AND message:"Error initializing Grails"
environment:${zone} AND (role:"web" OR role:"jobs") AND message:"Invalidating cached JSON for Hotel"
environment:${zone} AND priority:ERROR AND role:"jobs" AND message:"Too many connections"
environment:${zone} AND role:"jobs" AND priority:ERROR AND  message:"org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.PoolExhaustedException"
environment:${zone} AND role:"jobs" AND message:"com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLTransactionRollbackException: Lock wait timeout exceeded; try restarting transaction"
environment:${zone} AND role:jobs AND (priority:ERROR OR priority:WARN)
environment:prod AND priority:ERROR AND (role:"web" OR role:"jobs") AND message:com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.*
environment:prod AND "Row was updated or deleted by another transaction (or unsaved-value mapping was incorrect) : [com.alice.HotelUser#"

panels.title: Row was updated or deleted by another transaction

targets.query: environment:prod AND priority:ERROR AND (role:"web" OR role:"jobs") AND message:org.hibernate.exception.*

targets.expr: min by(job)(100 - (sum by (job, instance)(increase(jvm_gc_collection_seconds_sum[1m])) * 100 / sum by (job, instance) (increase(process_cpu_seconds_total[1m]))))
